languages.text:
Переключайтесь между спутниками — для этого зажмите и удерживайте {console_bind|LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
При просмотре описания предметов вам будет видно сравнительное описание аналогичных предметов у выбранного персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
Вы можете переключать персонажей с помощью стрелочек в верхней части инвентаря или через [ЛКМ] на портрете персонажа.
Для этого зажмите и удерживайте { console_bind | LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью { console_bind | DPad}/{ console_bind | LeftStick} и отпустите { console_bind | LeftBottom}.
При просмотре описания экипируемых предметов вам будет видно сравнительное описание аналогичных предметов у выбранного персонажа.

languages.text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.
languages.original_text:
Переключайтесь между спутниками — для этого зажмите и удерживайте {console_bind|LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
При просмотре описания предметов вам будет видно сравнительное описание аналогичных предметов у выбранного персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between them and any similar items already equipped by the currently selected character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

languages.text:
Puedes cambiar de miembros de grupo manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, seleccionando un personaje con {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
Al ver las descripciones de las piezas de equipamiento, se te mostrará una comparativa entre la pieza seleccionada y el objeto correspondiente que ya lleve equipado el personaje en cuestión.
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

traits.locale_text:
Puedes cambiar de miembros de grupo manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, seleccionando un personaje con {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
Al ver las descripciones de las piezas de equipamiento, se te mostrará una comparativa entre la pieza seleccionada y el objeto correspondiente que ya lleve equipado el personaje en cuestión.

languages.text:
{console_bind|LeftBottom}を押しながら、{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}でキャラクターを選択し、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離すことでグループメンバーを切り替えることができる。
装備の説明を表示すると、選択した装備と、現在選択されているキャラクターがすでに装備している同類のアイテムとの比較が表示される。
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

traits.locale_text:
{console_bind|LeftBottom}を押しながら、{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}でキャラクターを選択し、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離すことでグループメンバーを切り替えることができる。
装備の説明を表示すると、選択した装備と、現在選択されているキャラクターがすでに装備している同類のアイテムとの比較が表示される。

languages.text:
您可以切换队伍中的成员，先按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，再按下{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}来切换角色，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}。
当您查看装备说明时，您可以看到目标装备与角色当前装备之间的比较结果。
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

traits.locale_text:
您可以切换队伍中的成员，先按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，再按下{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}来切换角色，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}。
当您查看装备说明时，您可以看到目标装备与角色当前装备之间的比较结果。

languages.text: Du kannst zwischen Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, einen Charakter mit {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} auswählst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Während du dir die Ausrüstungsbeschreibungen ansiehst, werden dir Vergleiche zwischen der ausgewählten Ausrüstung und den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der aktuell ausgewählte Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat, angezeigt.
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst zwischen Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, einen Charakter mit {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} auswählst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Während du dir die Ausrüstungsbeschreibungen ansiehst, werden dir Vergleiche zwischen der ausgewählten Ausrüstung und den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der aktuell ausgewählte Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat, angezeigt.

languages.text:
Pour passer d'un membre du groupe à l'autre, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, sélectionnez un personnage à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
Lors de l'affichage des descriptions des équipements, des comparaisons entre l'équipement sélectionné et les éléments correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage sélectionné vous seront présentées.
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.

traits.locale_text:
Pour passer d’un membre du groupe à l'autre, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, sélectionnez un personnage à l'aide de {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
Lors de l'affichage des descriptions des équipements, des comparaisons entre l'équipement sélectionné et les éléments correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage sélectionné vous seront présentées.

languages.text:
{console_bind|LeftBottom} düğmesini basılı tutup {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} ile bir karakteri seçip ardından {console_bind|LeftBottom} düğmesini bırakarak grup üyeleri arasında geçiş yapabilirsin.
Ekipman açıklamalarını incelerken, seçili ekipman ile hâlihazırda seçili karakterin kuşanmış olduğu benzer eşyaların kıyaslaması ekranda gösterilir.
languages.original_text:
You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}.
While viewing equipment descriptions, you will be presented with comparisons between the selected equipment and any corresponding items already equipped by the currently selected character.
